channel.title: hash on Li. Mingzhi
channel.description: Recent content in hash on Li. Mingzhi

item.title: AL: 5. Hash tables
item.description: 1. Requirements for hash function It needs to be consistent. It should map different workds to different numbers. You get a hash table by putting a hash function and an array together. Hash tables use an array to store data since we can get an item from an array instantly(O(1)). 2. Use cases 2.1 Using hash tables for lookups Hash tables make it easy to model a relationship from one item to another.
